profile.description: Passionate about new technologies and especially the CSS and JavaScript ecosystem. My abundant energy feeds me in the pursuit of many interests, hobbies, areas of study and artistic activities. I learn fast,able to acquire new skills and work with different projects and roles with relative ease. I like to develop expertise in a number of areas throughout my life and career.
